Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

DataStorageLineOfService.description: Describe data storage and provisioning capabilities.
DataStorageLineOfService.longDescription: This structure may be used to describe a service option covering storage provisioning and availability.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AccessCapabilities.longDescription: Each entry specifies a required storage access capability.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

IsSpaceEfficient.description: True implies compression or deduplication of storage.
IsSpaceEfficient.longDescription: A value of true shall indicate that the storage is compressed or deduplicated. The default value for this property is false.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ProvisioningPolicy.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall define the provisioning policy for storage.

RecoverableCapacitySourceCount.description: Required minimum number of available capacity source resources.
RecoverableCapacitySourceCount.longDescription: The value is minimum required number of available capacity source resources that shall be available in the event that an equivalent capacity source resource fails.  It is assumed that drives and memory components can be replaced, repaired or otherwise added to increase an associated resource's RecoverableCapacitySourceCount.

RecoveryTimeObjectives.description: Expectations for time to access the primary store after disaster recover.
RecoveryTimeObjectives.longDescription: The enumeration literal specifies the time after a disaster that the client shall regain conformant service level access to the primary store, typical values are 'immediate' or 'offline'. The expectation is that the services required to implement this capability are part of the advertising system.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #DataStorageLineOfService.v1_3_1.DataStorageLineOfService
